ComicInfo.Title: Are You There, Deadpool? It's Me, Deadpool.
ComicInfo.Summary: Special double-sized issue with art by ROB LIEFELD, KYLE BAKER, DAS PASTORAS and regular series artist BONG DAZO. What do you do with a homesick zombie head? Take it back to the zombie universe, of course! Hopping through an interdimensional portal in the Florida swamp with Headpool tucked under his arm, Deadpool soon finds himself bouncing through a series of outlandish alternate realities, each more warped than the last. Wade Wilson, say hello to Major Deadpool, the Deadpool Kid and - va-va-voom - Lady Deadpool.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 21:44:55. [CVDB193508]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Bong Dazo, Das Pastoras, Kyle Baker, Rob Liefeld
ComicInfo.Inker: Das Pastoras, Jose Pimentel, Kyle Baker, Rob Liefeld
ComicInfo.Colorist: Das Pastoras, Kyle Baker, Matt Milla, Rob Liefeld
ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Joe Quesada, Sebastian Girner
ComicInfo.Characters: Bill, Agent of A.I.M., Captain America, Deadpool, Deadpool Kid, Doctor Voodoo, Dr. Betty, Lady Deadpool, Major Deadpool, Nick Fury, Wolverine, Zombie Deadpool
